title: Scenario-Based Science Simulation Learning Course: Strengthening Civic Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education-level foundational science knowledge and experience in solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: A blended environment combining smartphone-based mobile learning with small-group face-to-face sessions, centered on role-play simulations for solving science problems relevant to daily life.

learning_goals: Learners can perform problem-solving procedures with 80% accuracy using physical tools/materials in a given science scenario.
Learners can provide constructive feedback three or more times during simulation task resolution through collaboration with peer learners.
Learners can propose two or more real-world problem-solving strategies in a simulation environment by applying a structured science experiment protocol.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
